Animals and their habitats would be given greater protection from human activities.
There would likely be more controversy and debate about the use of animals in experimentation or entertainment.
Some argue that animals should not be harmed for the sake of humans, so there may be a reduction in meat production and increased focus on plant-based diets.
There would be more empathy toward animals as they are viewed as equal members of society.
Animal welfare groups may have more power to protect and advocate for their rights.
